title: Royal Enfield opens first warehouse in eastern region
description: Royal Enfield has inaugurated its first warehouse in the eastern region, located near Kolkata, to address spare parts needs. Covering 50,000 sq ft in the Bagnan area of Howrah district, the warehouse aims to significantly reduce transit time for motorcycle parts supply and facilitate the development of channel partners. The facility will serve as a distribution hub for spare parts in the entire eastern and northeastern region.
